mapper.select: select top 1 userid, passwd1, custcd, custnm, pernm, useyn , (select sum(isnull(point,0)) as totpoint from tb_itemlist where userid =#{userid} ) as totpoint from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1}
select top 1 custcd from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_XUSERS (custcd, userid, passwd1, passwd2, emailtxt, pernm, custnm, useyn) values (#{custcd}, #{userid}, #{passwd1}, #{passwd2}, #{emailtxt}, #{pernm}, #{custnm}, #{useyn})

insert into TB_ITEMLIST (custcd, inputdate, itemsubject, pernm, itemmemo, flag, location, reflag, boxpass, userid) values (#{custcd}, #{inputdate}, #{itemsubject}, #{pernm}, #{itemmemo}, #{flag}, #{location} , 'N', #{boxpass}, #{userid})
mapper.update: update TB_ITEMLIST set inputdate = #{inputdate}, itemsubject = #{itemsubject}, pernm =#{pernm}, itemmemo =#{itemmemo}, flag =#{flag}, location =#{location}, boxpass=#{boxpass} where seq = #{seq}
update TB_ITEMLIST set enddate = #{enddate}, endmemo = #{endmemo}, point =1, reflag ='Y' where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select A.seq, A.custcd, substring(A.inputdate, 0,5) + '-' + substring(A.inputdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(A.inputdate, 7,2) as inputdate, A.itemsubject, isnull(A.pernm, '') as pernm, A.itemmemo, A.flag, isnull(A.location, '') as location, (case A.flag when '001' then '분실' when '002' then '습득' else '' end ) as flagnm, boxpass, endmemo from TB_ITEMLIST A WITH (NOLOCK) where A.custcd = #{custcd} and A.itemsubject like CONCAT('%',#{itemsubject},'%') and reflag = 'N' ORDER BY A.seq desc , A.inputdate, A.itemsubject

select A.seq, A.custcd, substring(A.inputdate, 0,5) + '-' + substring(A.inputdate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(A.inputdate, 7,2) as inputdate, A.itemsubject, isnull(A.pernm, '') as pernm, A.itemmemo, A.flag, isnull(A.location, '') as location, (case A.flag when '001' then '분실' when '002' then '습득' else '' end ) as flagnm, boxpass, endmemo, enddate from TB_ITEMLIST A WITH (NOLOCK) where A.itemsubject like CONCAT('%',#{itemsubject},'%') and reflag = 'Y' ORDER BY A.seq desc , A.inputdate, A.itemsubject
